attributes.action: Move test and trace from Dido Harding to NHS Public health.
attributes.additional_details: The only way to stop a huge amount of deaths is if we have a working trace and trace system. We want the system to be taken away from the private sector and allow public health England to take over this shambles.
attributes.background: The test and trace system is not working. It has not been able to stop a second wave. Its has cost a huge amount. The government must realise that we are entitled to a working track and trace system and putting it in the hands of their friends is not the best option for the people.
